name: SRD-1656D (16ch) (8ch HD-SDI)
description: 16CH 1280H (950TVL) non real-time DVR - Up to 120(N) / 100(P)fps recording rate
Easy user interface, common across all Samsung DVRs - GUI / Search / Back up / Set-up
Set independently for each channel - REC / Quality / Resolution
Privacy mask support for each channel (4ea)
Convenient with strong network monitoring - CMS (SSM, SmartViewer, Net-I), Web viewer, Smart phones (iPOLiS mobile)
Accurate still image (De-Interlace support each channel)
VGA / HDMI for Full-HD (1080p) resolution video out
Digital video spot (2ea), USB (2ports) back up
Up to 16CH audio inputs / 1CH audio output

members.name: Video Input
members.details: 16 Composite video 0.5-1 Vpp, 75 ohm automatic termination

members.name: Audio Input
members.details: 16CH line in (Built-in 4CH, option : audio extension cable)

members.name: Record Rate
members.details:
NTSC : Up to 120fps@1280 x 480 / PAL : Up to 100fps@1280 x 576
NTSC : Up to 120fps@704 x 480 / PAL : Up to 100fps@704 x 576
NTSC : Up to 240fps@704 x 240 / PAL : Up to 200fps@704 x 288
NTSC : Up to 480fps@352 x 240 / PAL : Up to 400fps@352 x 288

members.name: external (e-SATA Interface)
members.details: 2 External SATA ports  (*Expansion bay, Model : SVS-5R/5E)

members.name: Serial Interface
members.details: RS-232/RS-485 (Full duplex) for PTZ, Samsung system keyboard
